name: barbcut-firebase-functions
description: Cloud Functions for Barbcut Firebase Backend

scripts.serve: npm run build && cd .. && firebase emulators:start --only auth,firestore,functions,storage
scripts.predeploy: npm run copy-assets && npm run build
scripts.seed:mock: npm run build && FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 node build/mock_data.js
scripts.migrate:up: npm run build && FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9199 node build/cli.js up
scripts.migrate:down: npm run build && FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9199 node build/cli.js down
scripts.migrate:status: npm run build && FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:8080 FIREBASE_STORAGE_EMULATOR_HOST=127.0.0.1:9199 node build/cli.js status
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run copy-assets && npm run build && node build/cli.js
